synopsis.text: Kanojo is a college student who has lived happily with her beloved pet cat Daru for years. When her roommate moves out, Kanojo faces the challenge of finding a job to afford keeping her apartment. Determined and diligent, she continues her job search day after day. Meanwhile, Daru eagerly awaits her return each evening. He observes her efforts through a devoted pet's perspective. Though Kanojo's life is changing, one thing remains constant - the special bond she shares with her feline friend. As long as they have each other, both cat and owner feel they can face any challenge life brings. Kanojo to Kanojo no Neko: Everything Flows captures the endearing connection between a young woman and her cat as they transition into a new chapter of life together. With humor and warmth, it reminds us that love and companionship can turn any house into a home.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
